text: As technology advances

and remote collaboration
becomes the norm.

Private, secure and compliant business
communications become even more critical.

But many services don't have the levels
of security and control needed.

AWS Wickr is an end to end
encrypted service

offering advanced security and
administrative controls across messaging,
voice and video calling,
file sharing,
screen sharing and more.

Every message call and file
is encrypted locally

when sent or received with a 256 bit
advanced encryption standard algorithm.

So only the intended recipients
can view your shared content.
Unlike consumer grade applications,

which are used by some organizations
for encrypted communications,

AWS Wickr allows you to
own and retain your data.

This is invaluable for regulatory
and auditing purposes

because you're in charge of
data retention policies.
You can also manage user accounts,
configure ephemeral messaging options,

and define security groups
for granular controls.
AWS Wicker is simple to set up

and networks can be quickly created
and managed through your AWS console.

Create a secure communication
network today with AWS Wickr.
